t: Unilever sells laundry products business
s: November 10, 2023 - Packaged-goods giant Unilever is selling its North American line of laundry products to a private equity firm. The line, which includes such big-selling brands as All, Wisk, and Snuggle, will be merged with Huish Detergents to create The Sun Products Corporation.
